response.original_title: 放送禁止VTR！ 噂の廃病院 恐怖！廃墟都市伝説の検証
response.overview: This is a compilation of a horror series in which the crew visits a scary spot where there are urban legends and bad rumors, and investigates the truth behind the rumors. While remarkable urban development is taking place, there are abandoned ruins deep in the mountains that seem to have been forgotten by the people. The team goes to an abandoned hospital where rumors persist, and attempts a desperate report...
response.title: Broadcast Prohibited VTR! Rumored Abandoned Hospital: Terror! Investigating Ruin Urban Legends
